name: MakeMyDay
0:
”Alexa Make My Day”
”Alexa open Make My Day”
”Alexa ask Make My Day to tell me a quote”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: make my day
des:
Get your daily dose of positivity through an inspiring quote followed by a beautiful message just for you.

The perfect inspiration and motivation to get you started for the day or to lift your mood and make your day!

To start, just say "Alexa, Make My Day".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
